credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. G. Glen Gould
title: Shawl fragment
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: interlocking twill, free shuttle detail
description: Symmetrical horizontal repeat of alternative variants of floral motif in lobed medallion framed in decorated arabesques; floral guard band below with decorated guard stripe.  In blue-ish pinks, purples, turquoise, yellow, orange, vermillion, green, dark brown, on brown ground.  Guard band on white ground.  Loom endings, reinforced on long sides.
name: Shawl fragment
